actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to carry out a waters resources development project on, and along, a certain segment of the Des Moines River, Iowa.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to construct, operate, and maintain recreational facilities and streambank stabilization along the Des Moines River, Iowa. Empowers the Secretary to enforce certain limitations, including the protection of wild animals and birds. Authorizes the Secretary to acquire the necessary land and interests to carry out such project. States that the Federal share of such project shall be 100 percent. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to carry out a waters resources development project on, and along, a certain segment of the Des Moines River, Iowa.
